abilities.name: Snow Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow

weaknesses.description: As a snow-based Logia, the fruit is vulnerable to high temperatures

reveals.information: Monet officially names her Devil Fruit as the Yuki Yuki no Mi
reveals.context: Monet reveals herself as a Snow Human during her confrontation with Luffy

trivia: The fruit allows transformation into snow, making Monet a Snow Human
Episode 608 is when the Devil Fruit's name was officially revealed by Monet herself

abilities.name: Weapon Transformation
abilities.description: Allows the user to transform any part of their body into various weapons

abilities.name: Axe Form
abilities.description: Baby 5 can transform her limbs into axes

reveals.information: Baby 5 demonstrates her ability to transform body parts into weapons
reveals.context: Baby 5 attacks Doflamingo with an axe transformation

trivia: First shown when Baby 5 attacks Doflamingo during his conversation with Vergo
The fruit makes Baby 5 a versatile weapons platform
